GBM Simulator Module

This module provides classes for simulating Brownian motion and geometric Brownian motion.

class gbm_simulator.GBMSimulator(y0, mu, sigma)

Bases: Stochastic_Processes

simulate_path(T, N)

Simulates 1D GBM and plots a graph. Saves plot in folder.

Parameters:

  • T (float) – Time scale of the Brownian motion.

  • N (int) – Number of time steps

Returns:

Timesteps in array format. Y_t (np.array): Brownian motion displacement in arrary format for corresponding timesteps.

Return type:

t (np.array)

class gbm_simulator.Stochastic_Processes(y0)

Bases: object

brownian_motion(T, N)

Calculates the Brownian motion random walk over.

Parameters:

  • T (float) – Time scale of the Brownian motion.

  • N (int) – Number of time steps.

Returns:

Timesteps in array format. B_t (np.array): Brownian motion displacement in arrary format for corresponding timesteps.

Return type:

t (np.array)

plot(t, Y_t)

Plots a graph of the Brownian motion displacement (y-axis) with the corresponding time-steps. Saves plot in folder.

Parameters:

  • t (np.array) – Timesteps in array format.

  • Y_t (np.array) – Brownian motion displacement in arrary format for corresponding timesteps.
